definition: a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: And if war comes do such men as these shoulder the musket and go into the trenches?
sentences.chinese: 但一旦战争来临，这类人会肩扛步枪进入战壕吗？

sentences.english: Such rifles could not be loaded as rapidly as smoothbore muskets.
sentences.chinese: 它们不能像无膛线步枪那样迅速填装弹药。

sentences.english: Tommy is in charge of the rifles; traditional spears are used rarely these days.
sentences.chinese: 汤米掌管步枪，传统的长矛现在很少使用了。

sentences.english: The soldiers couched their rifles and prepared to charge.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们将步枪放平准备冲锋。

sentences.english: Burr had removed the cartridges from each man's musket during the night.
sentences.chinese: 伯尔夜早已把各士兵步枪的子弹取去。

sentences.english: The rifle recoils when it is fired.
sentences.chinese: 步枪射出子弹后要反冲一下。

sentences.english: They say he used a military-style assault rifle to carry out the shooting spree.
sentences.chinese: 他们称，他使用一支军用突击步枪实施了此次枪击案。

sentences.english: Dashing down the rifle, he drew out a dagger and streaked towards the enemy soldier.
sentences.chinese: 他扔下步枪，拔出匕首，向敌兵飞扑过去。

sentences.english: Rounds of automatic rifle fire crackled into the air throughout the day, punctuated by the intermittent sounds of explosions.
sentences.chinese: 自动步枪整日不休地进行攻击，时而穿插着爆炸声。
开始是步枪然后是两挺机枪。

sentences.english: I got shot six times with a 762 assault rifle and I'm still alive.
sentences.chinese: 我六次被762突击步枪击中，但我现在还活着。

sentences.english: There was a rattle of rifle-fire.
sentences.chinese: 传来一阵步枪发出的嗒嗒声。

sentences.english: With nearly every stride, our feet crunch spent rifle cartridges.
sentences.chinese: 几乎每走一步，脚下用过的步枪子弹都会吱嘎作响。

sentences.english: In olden times one had to charge a musket before firing.
sentences.chinese: 以前必须先给步枪装上火药才能开枪。
说着他取了沙威那支步枪。

sentences.english: Can you explain a small bore rifle ?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我讲讲小口径步枪吗？

definition: (coll.) Arisaka Type 38 rifle (Japanese army rifle used 1905-1945)
